text: Igor Fesunenko (January 28, 1933 - April 28, 2016) was a Soviet and Russian journalist and writer. He was a professor at the Moscow State Institute of International Relations. He was born in Orenburg.Outdoor Club Orenburg - Igor Fesunenko From 1975 to 1979, he worked in Portugal. He then worked as a political columnist and host of such programs as Today in the World, The Camera Looks Into the World, International Panorama, Vremya. In the early 1990s, he worked in Italy. He returned to Moscow in the late 1990s. Fesunenko died in Moscow, Russia on April 28, 2016, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Igor Fesunenko interview Category:1933 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Russian writers Category:Russian journalists Category:People from Orenburg Oblast
title: Igor Fesunenko
